Articles.Content:
Hello guys maybe interest my idea to the new uptate : (EVA supply pack) this contain : Water, Food, Oxigen.

Or I have an another idea : (living being) in other and other planets who can build and trade we sample: ship parts or EVA supply pack and even such.

Sorry for bad English im Hungarian.

There will be no aliens in this game

Lifesupport is coming later. MUCH later
Food wouldn't be as important as water or O2
Yeh, the devs say no aliens. Ever. And personally Im inclined to agree with them it's so out of place with KSP. But the life support stuff is planned to be added (eventually)

there are mods for life support, evas included

for example tac life support

I agree that sentient life should never be included. However, I like the idea of finding extra-terrestrial algae floating in the seas of Laythe and returning a sample for further study. I think this would be great even if this is only implemented as science flavor text.
